input.sentences: we decided to go down to the dike for the day .
we were able to look through this scope and see that little island out there .
the family decided to take a break and just relax watching the shore .
we found these interesting little plants | i wonder what it is called .
there were many birds out and about wanting our food .
output.sentences: Tourism can be both beneficial and detrimental to the environment
The landscape must be attractive and accommodating to potential visitors
People need to feel relaxed and spend their time and money in order for the place to be labeled efficient.
The wildlife can suffer as a result, if certain sites don't fit into the guidelines
At the same time, the money generated from such developments can fund research and be used to preserve the local wildlife.
